title: Turing's Learning Machine
description: Alan Turing proposes a 'learning machine' that could learn and become artificially intelligent.

title: First Neural Network Machine
description: Marvin Minsky and Dean Edmonds build the first neural network machine.

title: Arthur Samuel's Checkers Robot
description: Arthur Samuel creates early AI, capable of learning checkers.

title: First Industrial Robot
description: Unimate, the earliest industrial robot, debuts at General Motors.

title: ELIZA
description: Joseph Weizenbaum builds ELIZA, an early chatbot.

title: Deep Blue Defeats Kasparov
description: Deep Blue, a Chess-playing AI, defeats world champion Gary Kasparov in a game of Chess.

title: Deep Learning Revolution
description: Deep Learning becomes the primary training method after the success of AlexNet, a Deep Learning algorithm developed by Alex Krizhevsky.

title: DeepFace
description: Facebook researchers reveal DeepFace, an algorithm that recognizes faces with over 97% accuracy.

title: GPT Developed
description: OpenAI develops the generative pre-trained transformer (GPT) framework for large-language models

title: Protein-predicting AI
description: AlphaFold develops a highly accurate AI for predicting protein structure

title: OpenAI releases DALL-E 2 to public
description: DALL-E 2 shows unprecedented image generation capabilities to the public.

title: ChatGPT Debut
description: ChatGPT debuts, resulting in a massive increase in interest around AI language models
